item.title: RTC Radio
item.description: Have to send this out to just about EVERYBODY as listening back to this origin recording, you all get a shout. :o) Recorded July 2009 this is a full 3hrs of the MINNS in the MIX. (This is 3 of a usual 4hr show ;) If you like ????? Check my LIVE fortnightly webcasts from .... http://www.originuk.net Every 2nd Wednesday ... Midday -> 4pm (GMT)

item.title: David Minns - Classic UK House Part 2
item.description: Another installment of my podcasts. This time part 2 of my favourite classic house on vinyl. This one again was produced for Vegas Baby at The White House in June 2009. Enjoy, DJM
item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary:
Another installment of my podcasts. This time part 2 of my favourite classic house on vinyl. This one again was produced for Vegas Baby at The White House in June 2009.
Enjoy, DJM

item.title: Dave Minns - Classic UK House
item.description: 1st of two mixes I did last year from my old vinyl for Vegas Baby at The White House

item.itunes:summary: 1st of two mixes I did last year from my old vinyl for Vegas Baby at The White House

item.title: David Minns OUT OF THE BOX 2004
item.description: This is a RARE RARE mix I did as only had one copy which came back scratched hence 30mins missing, have tracklisting and will re-create one day but for now the ORIGINAL. Mixed for Russell Smiths birthday as a gift from all my vinyls. Enjoy and please give feedback.
item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary: This is a RARE RARE mix I did as only had one copy which came back scratched hence 30mins missing, have tracklisting and will re-create one day but for now the ORIGINAL. Mixed for Russell Smiths birthday as a gift from all my vinyls. Enjoy and please give feedback.

item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary: Chad Jackson and David Minns Join Jay Cunning on his Kiss FM Breakbeat Show.

item.title: Corey Gibbons LIVE at Read The Crowd - PART 1
item.description: Recorded LIVE at The White House on Friday May 8th 2009 May 09 Live mix @ The White House London (PartI) ------------------------------------------------ Sono - Keep Control Plus (Fedde Le Grand Remix) Alex Kenji – Down (Corey’s Fu*k-up) Sean Miller – Santanera (Corey’s Fu*k-up) Audiowhores & Haze – Stay (Shik Stylko Mix) Tic Tac (Milton Channels Mix vs Corey’s Fu*k-up) Sebastian Ingrosso - Laktos (Corey’s Fu*k-up) Audiojack - Schizophonic (Original) Christian Key - Hey Boy Hey Girl (Nick Corline Mix vs Corey’s Fu*k-up) Pryda - Reeperbahn (Corey’s Fu*k-up) David Tort – Acid Liquid - Sweet Harmony (Dave Spoon & James Talk Remix) Daley Padley, Prok & Fitch – New Wave – (Noir Remix) Hoxton Whores – Devil Toys (Corey’s Fu*k-up) Steve Angello – Isabel (Original)
item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary:
Recorded LIVE at The White House on Friday May 8th 2009

item.title: Corey Gibbons LIVE at Read The Crowd - PART 2
item.description: Recorded LIVE at The White House on Friday May 8th 2009. May 09 Live mix @ The Whitehouse London (PartII) ------------------------------------------------- Menini, Viani - La La Land feat. Christian Key (Matteo Marini Remix) Pryda – Lift (Corey’s Fu*k-up) Robin S & Corey Gibbons – At My Best (Spider & Legaz Mix) Dirty South - Minority (Benny Royal Remix) Bart B More - So It Goes (Chocolate Puma Remix) Daft Punk - One More Time (Richard Grey Subliminal Remix) DJ Wady & Patrik M – Hulk Alex Kenji – Up Underworld – Born Slippy (Manuel De La Mare Mix) Danism & Haze – Strike (Nick Bridges Mix) Daley Padley & Fribbs – Open Minds (Original)

item.title: So Called Scumbags LIVE in the MIX!
item.description: Recorded at one of London's biggest and well known clubs, this 1hr and 15minute mix from the So Called Scumbags really shows you what we're all about. ENJOY! Big thanks to all at Union. :o)
item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary:
Recorded at one of London's biggest and well known clubs, this 1hr and 15minute mix from the So Called Scumbags really shows you what we're all about. ENJOY!
Big thanks to all at Union. :o)

item.title: Nicky Holloway Retro Mix
item.description: Nicky Holloway takes you through this retrospective mix of anthems from 20yrs of dance music. To download RIGHT CLICK on Download link and 'Save target/file as ...' Catch Nicky alongside Chad Jackson & Cagedbaby this New Years Eve at The White House in Clapham Common as we celebrate Decades of Dance. More info: info@thewhitehouselondon.co.uk
item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary:
Nicky Holloway takes you through this retrospective mix of anthems from 20yrs of dance music. To download RIGHT CLICK on Download link and 'Save target/file as ...'

More info: info@thewhitehouselondon.co.uk

item.title: Dom B 'Stanton Warriors' Interview
item.description: Just ahead of the now released Stanton Sessions 3; I met up with Dom B for a chat about the new album, stantons on tour, their infulences and more.
item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary: Just ahead of the now released Stanton Sessions 3; I met up with Dom B for a chat about the new album, stantons on tour, their infulences and more.

item.title: Ministry Of Sound Radio Mix
item.description: Broadcast on the day of our debut gig in the Box at the Ministry of Sound for Gallery. Big ups to Steve from Ministry Radio and Bestival FM for broadcasting the mix and phoning me for the live interview at the start. Please Enjoy, David Minns & James Edwards b2b in the mix for Minisry of Sound Radio. Tracklisting: Primal Scream - Loaded (accapella) Milton Channels - Lose You James Edwards - Do You James Edwards - What I Call Rhythmn Timo Garcia - Hang Drum Track No Body's Business (accapella) James Edwards - Tinkerbell on Speed Chocolate Puma - Touch Me Jon Dahlback - Pyramid Way Out West - Spaceman Tracy Thorne - Grand Canyon (Dirty South Mix) Underworld - Holding The North Vagua - Brown Suga Kumuki - Grail vs 2Limit Eric Morillo vs DJ DLG - Where Are You Now Jason Jinx - Bring That Feeling Back (accapella)
item.dc:creator: Read The Crowd
item.itunes:summary:
Broadcast on the day of our debut gig in the Box at the Ministry of Sound for Gallery.
Big ups to Steve from Ministry Radio and Bestival FM for broadcasting the mix and phoning me for the live interview at the start.
Please Enjoy, David Minns & James Edwards b2b in the mix for Minisry of Sound Radio.
Tracklisting:
Primal Scream - Loaded (accapella) Milton Channels - Lose You James Edwards - Do You James Edwards - What I Call Rhythmn Timo Garcia - Hang Drum Track No Body's Business (accapella) James Edwards - Tinkerbell on Speed Chocolate Puma - Touch Me Jon Dahlback - Pyramid Way Out West - Spaceman Tracy Thorne - Grand Canyon (Dirty South Mix) Underworld - Holding The North Vagua - Brown Suga Kumuki - Grail vs 2Limit Eric Morillo vs DJ DLG - Where Are You Now Jason Jinx - Bring That Feeling Back (accapella)

item.title: Breakfastaz at Read The Crowd 2005
item.description: Short preview of the Breakfastaz live in the Read The Crowd Breaks Tunnel on Bongo Ted's Land. Recorded 2005 @ Networking Central festival. Full mix available soon. Subscribe to iTunes for updates. Right click on 'download to save'

item.title: David Minns on BBC Radio 1
item.description: Extract from the Annie Nightingale show which includes David Minns from Read The Crowd in the mix for 30mins. Broadcast on BBC Radio One on Saturday 19th January 2008

item.title: Chad Jackson 'RTC 1st Resident' Live at Read The Crowd 2006
item.description: Live recording of Read The Crowd's first and foremost resident .... Once World DMC Champ CHAD JACKSON. Recorded live at Brixton Telegraph.18th March 2006. If you like this? Subscribe were adding the 3deck 3hr Chad sets soon.
